title: A Pot of message
brief_description: Argues that Australians eat and drink too much and do not exercise enough. Because much of modern food is highly refined it lacks basic nutrition. Although there is a growing awareness of the need to eat more natural food it must be remembered that health foods and vitamin pills are not really the answer.
